issue.title: [Rust] enable integration test for 2.0.0 compression for rust version
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16861](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16861). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
After [compression pr](<https://github.com/apache/arrow-rs/pull/1855)> merged, we can  enable Rust 2.0.0 compression integration test.
